Package edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.groceryItem

Class GroceryItemServiceImplementation

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2106_09.backend.service.groceryItem.GroceryItemServiceImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GroceryItemService
@Service public class GroceryItemServiceImplementation extends Object implements GroceryItemService
The GroceryItemServiceImpl class is responsible for implementing the logic for managing Grocery Items in the application. It manages the removal, updating, retrieving and adding of groceryitems in shoppinglists, fridges and recipes.

    • transferGroceryItemsToFridge

      public void transferGroceryItemsToFridge(Long shoppinglistId, Long fridgeId, Set<GroceryItemDto> groceryItems)
      Transfers one or more GroceryItems from a Shoppinglist to a Fridge.
      Specified by:
      transferGroceryItemsToFridge in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - A Long representing the ID of the Shoppinglist to transfer the GroceryItems from.
      fridgeId - A Long representing the ID of the Fridge to transfer the GroceryItems to.
      groceryItems - A set of grocery items representing to be transferred.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Shoppinglist, Fridge, or GroceryItem with the given ID does not exist in the database.
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if an error occurs while accessing the database.
      org.hibernate.HibernateException - if an error occurs while Hibernate is executing a query or interacting with the database.
      Exception - if an unknown exception occurs.

      Adds one or more GroceryItems to a Shoppinglist and returns a ResponseEntity containing a Set of the added GroceryItemDtos.
      Specified by:
      addGroceryItemsToShoppinglist in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - A Long representing the ID of the Shoppinglist to add the GroceryItems to.
      groceryItems - A Set of GroceryItemDtos representing the GroceryItems to add to the Shoppinglist.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a Set of the added GroceryItemDtos and a status code indicating the success of the operation.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Shoppinglist or GroceryItem with the given ID does not exist in the database.

      Specified by:
      getGroceryItemsByIdInShoppinglist in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - The id of the shopping list to search in.
      groceryItemId - The id of the grocery item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a GroceryItemShoppinglistDto object if the grocery item is found in the shopping list, or a NOT_FOUND HttpStatus if the item or list is not found.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the grocery item with the given id is not found in the shopping list.

    • updateGroceryItemInShoppinglist

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> updateGroceryItemInShoppinglist(Long shoppinglistId, GroceryItemDto groceryItemDto)
      Updates a grocery item in a shopping list with the given id. Replaces the amount of the grocery item with the given amount, removes the grocery item from the list with the given timestamp, and adds the grocery item back to the list with the updated amount. If an actual shelf life is not provided or is 0, sets the actual shelf life to the expected shelf life of the grocery item. Saves the updated shopping list to the database and returns the updated grocery item as a GroceryItemDto object in a ResponseEntity with OK status.
      Specified by:
      updateGroceryItemInShoppinglist in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      shoppinglistId - the id of the shopping list containing the grocery item to update
      groceryItemDto - the GroceryItemDto object containing the updated information for the grocery item
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated GroceryItemDto object and OK status if the update is successful
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the grocery item or shopping list with the given ids are not found

    • addGroceryItemsToFridge

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemDto>> addGroceryItemsToFridge(Long fridgeId, Set<GroceryItemDto> groceryItems)
      Adds a set of grocery items to the fridge with the given fridgeId.
      Specified by:
      addGroceryItemsToFridge in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the ID of the fridge to add the grocery items to
      groceryItems - the set of GroceryItemDto objects to be added to the fridge
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a Set of GroceryItemDto objects that were successfully added to the fridge with the given fridgeId, along with a HttpStatus.OK status code, or a ResponseEntity with a HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND status code if either the fridge with the given fridgeId or a grocery item with one of the IDs in the set of groceryItems was not found

      Returns:

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<GroceryItemDto>> getAllGroceryItems()

      Specified by:
      getAllGroceryItems in interface GroceryItemService
      Returns:

    • deleteGroceryItem

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroceryItemDto> deleteGroceryItem(Long groceryItemId)
      Deletes a Grocery Item from the database by the provided ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteGroceryItem in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      groceryItemId - the ID of the Grocery Item to be deleted
      Returns:

      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the Grocery Item with the provided ID is not found

    • removeGroceryItemsFromFridge

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> removeGroceryItemsFromFridge(Long fridgeId, List<IngredientDTO> ingredients)
      Removes a list of ingredients from a fridge, identified by the fridgeId. The amount to remove for each ingredient is determined by the amount specified in the IngredientDTO object. Calls the removeAmountFromFridge method for each ingredient to perform the actual removal.
      Specified by:
      removeGroceryItemsFromFridge in interface GroceryItemService
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the id of the fridge from which to remove the ingredients
      ingredients - a list of IngredientDTO objects containing the id and amount of each ingredient to remove
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with NO_CONTENT status if the removal is successful
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the fridge with the given id is not found

    • removeAmountFromFridge

      public double removeAmountFromFridge(Long fridgeId, IngredientDTO ingredient)
      Removes a specified amount of an ingredient from a fridge, identified by the fridgeId. If there is not enough of the ingredient in the fridge to remove the specified amount, removes all the ingredients from the fridge and updates the amount to remove accordingly. Deletes the corresponding GroceryItemFridge object from the database if the amount is reduced to 0.
      Parameters:
      fridgeId - the id of the fridge from which to remove the ingredient
      ingredient - the IngredientDTO object containing the id and amount of the ingredient to remove
      Returns:
      the amount of the ingredient that could not be removed from the fridge
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the fridge with the given id is not found
